prompt: <description>**Part 1: A Rectangular Prism with a Tapered Top and a Flat Bottom** *Shape description:* A rectangular prism with a tapered top and a flat bottom. The top and bottom faces are parallel to each other, and the top face is perpendicular to the bottom face. The top and bottom faces are equidistant from the center of the object. The object is centered in the image. *Overall dimension:* The length, width, and height of the part are 0.75 units, 0.375 units, and 0.75 units respectively. *Instructions:* *Coordinate System:* 1. Create a new coordinate system with Euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, and -90.0 degrees. 2. Define the translation vector as 0.0, 0.375, 0.0. *Sketch:* 1. Create a new sketch on the X-Y plane of the coordinate system. 2. Draw the first line starting at (0.0, 0.0) and ending at (0.75, 0.0). 3. Draw the second line starting at (0.75, 0.0) and ending at (0.75, 0.125). 4. Draw the third line starting at (0.75, 0.125) and ending at (0.375, 0.125). 5. Draw the fourth line starting at (0.375, 0.125) and ending at (0.375, 0.25). 6. Draw the fifth line starting at (0.375, 0.25) and ending at (0.0, 0.25). 7. Draw the sixth line starting at (0.0, 0.25) and ending at (0.0, 0.0). *Extrusion:* 1. Scale the completed sketch by a factor of 0.75. 2. Extrude the sketch along the normal direction by 0.375 units. 3. Perform the New Body feature operation to produce a solid body from the sketch. Note: The final solid will have the desired shape described at the beginning, based on the input JSON.</description>
